text: Yak dlya tsiyeyi kotroyi torhovoyi v inshe mistse BOZHOYI domovlenosti, ta yikhni zobov'yazannya, dlya deshevoyi tsiny, vony ne otrymuyut聞 payovyy vnesok u U maybutn聞omu. BOH ne bude rozmovlyaty z nymy, ne dyvlyat聞sya na nykh, na Dni Resurrection, ne bude Vin ochyshchayut聞 yikh. Vony zaznaly bolisnoho retribution
